overview: Largely self-taught, Mike has had an interest in creating applications and user interfaces since he began writing basic code at age 12. He has led the technology thinking of clients since 2004, consulting with start-ups and major corporations alike – including Coca-Cola, The Home Depot, NAPA, Earthlink, The Centers for Disease Control, Pfizer and MTV â€“ and ran a successful technology consultancy from 2008 to 2011. As a passionate proponent of real-time interfaces, Mike has developed methods for scaling and delivering real-time information on the web that are still in use at his former client companies.
